## Biomimetics

> The mimicking of natural biological structures in the design of functional materials

::: {.callout}
There are specific reasons we might want to replace meat (`sustainability`).
By studying real meat closely we can determine how to replace it effectively.
An important aspect is recreating the fibrous structure of meat.
This is less important in products like burgers and nuggets,
which have a a more uniform structure due to processing.
:::
